titleStmt.title: The riches of grace displayed: the second part. In the great instances thereof. In giving the son. Sending the spirit. Effectual calling. God's covenanting with man. By W. Bagshaw, minister of the gospel
titleStmt.author: Bagshawe, William, 1628-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Ralph Shelmardine in Manchester,
